TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpServerChannel extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class TcpServerChannel Implements IChannel, IChannelReceiver, ISecurableChannel
type TcpServerChannel = class interface IChannelReceiver interface IChannel interface ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 針對遠端呼叫實作使用 TCP 通訊協定傳輸訊息的伺服器通道。

span.span: Implements a server channel for remote calls that uses the TCP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道會傳輸郵件，跨越遠端界限 （例如，電腦或應用程式定義域）。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, computers or application domains). 類別將使用 TCP 通訊協定的訊息傳輸。The class transports messages using the TCP protocol. .NET Framework 遠端基礎結構會使用通道來傳輸遠端呼叫。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 當用戶端呼叫遠端物件，呼叫會序列化成訊息是由用戶端通道所傳送和接收的伺服器通道。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然後，它會還原序列化，並處理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何傳回的值是經由伺服器通道，且由用戶端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 若要執行額外的伺服器端上的訊息處理您可以指定的實作透過其中所處理的所有訊息的介面傳遞執行個體。To perform additional processing of messages on the server side, you can specify an implementation of the interface through which all messages processed by the instance are passed. 執行個體會接受二進位或 SOAP 格式序列化的訊息。The instance accepts messages serialized in either binary or SOAP format. A物件中具有相關聯的組態屬性可以在設定執行階段組態檔中 (藉由叫用靜態方法) 或以程式設計方式 (藉由傳遞集合建構函式）。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 如需這些組態屬性的清單，請參閱 < [ 通道和格式子組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For a list of these configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). > [!NOTE] > 如果在伺服器電腦執行 Windows 95/98/Me，不能指定為安全。If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the cannot be specified as secure. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用可遠端處理型別。The following code example shows the use of a remotable type. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/remotable.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/remotable.cs#10)] 下列程式碼範例示範使用類別來公開遠端型別。The following code example shows the use of the class to expose a remotable type. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/server.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/server.cs#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式子組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe). > [!NOTE] > 如果在伺服器電腦執行 Windows 95/98/Me，不能指定為安全。If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the cannot be specified as secure. 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數來`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用此建構函式建立與特定的組態屬性的物件。The following code example shows the use of this constructor to create a object with specific configuration properties. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpAuth#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpAuth/CPP/server.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpAuth#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpAuth/CS/server.cs#21)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式設定屬性使用`name`參數。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果您想要註冊多個通道，每個通道都必須具有唯一的名稱。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. 若要要求可用的通訊埠動態指派，設定`port`參數設為 0 （零）。To request that an available port be dynamically assigned, set the `port` parameter to 0 (zero). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構。The following code example shows how to construct a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式設定屬性使用`name`參數。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果您想要註冊多個通道，每個通道都必須具有唯一的名稱。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. 若要要求可用的通訊埠動態指派，設定`port`參數設為 0 （零）。To request that an available port be dynamically assigned, set the `port` parameter to 0 (zero). 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數來`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構。The following code example shows how to construct a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然傳回的執行個體形式，這個屬性的值可以轉換成的執行個體描述的通道物件接聽。Although returned as an instance of , the value of this property can be cast to an instance of describing the channel to which the object listens. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用此屬性。The following code example shows the use of this property. value.span: 執行個體，包含通道的名稱。

span.span: A instance that contains the name of the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個已註冊的通道都有唯一的名稱。Every registered channel has a unique name. 名稱用來呼叫時，擷取特定通道。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用此屬性。The following code example shows the use of this property. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/server.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/server.cs#32)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelPriority As Integer
public: property int ChannelPriority { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前通道的優先權。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 整數，表示指派給通道的優先權。

span.span: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 優先順序會控制哪一個通道資料會出現在次序執行個體; 較低優先順序通道之前出現的較高優先順序通道。The priority controls the order in which channel data appears in a instance; higher priority channels appear before lower priority channels. 用戶端嘗試連線到它們列在順序中的伺服器通道執行個體。Clients try to connect to the server channels in the order that they are listed in the instance. 預設優先權為 1;允許使用負數的優先順序。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用此屬性。The following code example shows the use of this property. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/server.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/server.cs#32)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StartListening(object data) cil managed
abstract member StartListening : obj -> unit override this.StartListening : obj -> unit

span.span: Optional initialization information.

summary.span: 指示目前的通道在呼叫 方法以停止在通道上接聽之後，開始在通道上接聽。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening on a channel after the method has been called to stop listening on the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會自動呼叫`StartListening`，因此您不應該呼叫這個方法，除非先前已呼叫。The constructor automatically calls `StartListening`, so you shouldn't call this method unless was previously called. 呼叫`StartListening`已接聽通道上可能會導致非預期的行為，應該予以避免。Calling `StartListening` on an already listening channel may lead to unexpected behaviors and should be avoided. 如果您的通道會使用動態指派連接埠號碼，當您重新啟動接聽時，可能會變更您的連接埠號碼。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening. 資料物件可用來將特定的初始化狀態傳遞至通道。The data object can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果您不想將特定狀態傳遞至通道，將`data`至`null`。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopListening(object data) cil managed
abstract member StopListening : obj -> unit override this.StopListening : obj -> unit

param.name: data
param.span: 選擇性的通道狀態資訊。

span.span: Optional state information for the channel.

summary.span: 指示目前通道停止接聽要求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要停止接聽通道上使用這個方法。Use this method to stop listening on a channel. 若要重新啟動接聽，請使用方法。To restart listening, use the method. 如果您的通道會使用動態指派連接埠號碼，當您重新啟動接聽時，可能會變更您的連接埠號碼。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening. 資料物件可用來將特定的初始化狀態傳遞至通道。The data object can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果您不想將特定狀態傳遞至通道，將`data`至`null`。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.
